description:
The Law Offices of Dawn S. Veltman, LLC offers free consultations on Personal Injury cases.

As the founding attorney at the Law Offices of Dawn S. Veltman, I provide passionate family law guidance to people in Bel Air and Upper Marlboro, Maryland, and throughout the state. Recognizing the emotional and financial toll such matters may have on families, I offer a supportive hand and work to help those I represent to favorably and effectively resolve their legal issues...
